title.en: Isekai Saikouhou no Guild Leader ~Guild Saijaku no Boku da Kedo, Guild Members Zen'in no ai ga Omokute Guild o Yameraremasen~

altTitles.ja: 異世界最高峰のギルドリーダー～ギルド最弱の僕だけど、ギルメン全員の愛が重くてギルドをやめられません～

altTitles.en: Another World's Highest Guild Leader: I'm the Weakest in the Guild, But I Can't Quit the Guild Because of the Heavy Love of All the Guild Members

description.en: I thought that if I reincarnated, I would be able to build a happy harem and be peerless in another world...! ! The guild that was created on a whim has become the pinnacle guild of strong men. Moreover, except for me, everyone is handsome and beautiful. I'm the weakest in the guild... can I quit the guild now? The opening of the dark fantasy of the lethargic hero and the guild members who adore him at the level of worship――

title.en: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Rei - Irotoutoshi-hen

altTitles.ja: ひぐらしのなく頃に令 色尊し編

description.en: Sequel to Higurashi no Naku Koro Ni Hoshiwatashi-hen and Higurashi no Naku Koro Ni Oniokoshi-hen.

altTitles.ja: 世話やきキツネの仙狐さん

description.en:
Like many hardworking members of the workforce, Kuroto Nakano is perpetually stressed out by his job. Still, since he lives alone, he must carry on to sustain himself. Little do humans like Kuroto know, this stress takes the form of darkness residing within a person's body and will bring one's life to ruin.  
Fox deities can see this darkness and have the duty to save people before it is too late. To help rid Kuroto of his stress, Senko-san, an eight hundred-year-old foxgirl, volunteers to take care of him, and will do everything she can to ease the tension in his weary soul.

---

**Notes:**
- Despite initial serialization ending by November 2022, Comic Newtype announced on 9 February 2023 that the series would later resume publication.
description.ru: В повседневную жизнь Накано, работающего на «чёрную компанию», внезапно вторглась кицунэ Сэнко-сан (молодая жена 800 лет от роду). Будь то готовка, уборка или «особая забота» (чем бы это ни было), она исцелит его истощение своей нежной «заботой».
description.es-la: La vida cotidiana de Nanako, un hombre asalariado que trabaja en una compañía que lo explota, es repentinamente invadido por la Kitsune, Senko-san (800 años de edad- esposa joven). Ya sea cocina, limpieza o un servicio especial... Ella curará su agotamiento con su tierno cuidado.

title.en: Rikei ga Koi ni Ochita no de Shoumei shitemita

altTitles.ja: 理系が恋に落ちたので証明してみた。
リケ恋

altTitles.ja-ro: Rikei ga Koi ni Ochita no de Shoumei Shite Mita

altTitles.en: Science Fell in Love, so I Tried to Prove It
I Tried to Prove That Science Fell in Love
Science Has Fallen in Love, so We Tried to Prove It

altTitles.fr: J'ai essayé de prouver que la science était tombée amoureuse

altTitles.ru: Наука влюблена и мы докажем это
Учёные влюблены и намерены доказать это научно
Я пытался доказать, что наука влюбилась

altTitles.th: พิสูจน์นิยามความรักด้วยหลักวิชาสายวิทย์

altTitles.zh: 理科生坠入情网，故尝试证明。
试证明理科生已坠入情网。

altTitles.zh-hk: 理科生墜入情網，故嘗試證明。
試證明理科生已墜入情網。

description.en: Yukimura Shinya and Himuro Ayame are two scientists that want to find out if love can be solved by a scientific theory. These two scientists also have feelings for each other and want to be able to solve their true feelings through similar theoretical facts. With this perfect opportunity, these scientists will attempt to solve the theory of the love they express for each other.
description.ru: Химуро Аямэ и Юкимура Шинья ну просто обожают точные науки. Им надо, чтобы всё имело научное обоснование, ведь без этого нельзя быть уверенным ни в чём. Ох уж эти ученые, какие только эксперименты не придут в эти головы, чтобы доказать "любовь".

altTitles.zh-ro: Dou Po Cang Qiong Zhi Da Zhu Zai
Dòu Pò Cāng Qióng Zhī Dà Zhǔ Zǎi

description.en:
The Great Thousand World. It is a place where numerous planes intersect, a place where many clans live and a place where a group of lords assemble. The Heavenly Sovereigns appear one by one from the Lower Planes and they will all display a legend that others would desire as they pursue the road of being a ruler in this boundless world.  
  
In the Endless Fire Territory that the Flame Emperor controls, thousands of fire blazes through the heavens.  
  
Inside the Martial Realm, the power of the Martial Ancestor frightens the heaven and the earth.  
  
At the West Heaven Temple, the might of the Emperor of a Hundred Battles is absolute.  
  
In the Northern Desolate Hill, a place filled with thousands of graves, the Immortal Owner rules the world.  
  
A boy from the Northern Spiritual Realm comes out, riding on a Nine Netherworld Bird, as he charges into the brilliant and diverse world. Just who can rule over their destiny of their path on becoming a Great Ruler? In the Great Thousand World, many strive to become a Great Ruler.  
  
*Note : The Comic Format Change From Normal Page to Longstrip Starting at Chapter 84,*
description.vi: Trong đại thiên thế giới, nơi các vị diện giao thoa, vạn tộc lập quần hùng, lần lượt là những thiên vương từ các hạ vị diện, trong đại thiên thế giới này, đang lập nên những huyền thoại mà mọi người khao khát, theo đuổi chúa tể chi lộ. Đạo tranh phía trước, ta chính là đại chúa tể!

altTitles.ja: トランスフォーマーごー！　ごー！

description.en:
Autobots, roll out!
It's Transformers, now in gag manga form!
The Transformers are super-lifeforms from another planet, who have scanned Earth vehicles and animals to transform into! And now they're here to make you laugh and cheer!

title.en: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden:  Kikuri Hiroi's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！外伝　廣井きくりの深酒日記

altTitles.en: Bocchi the Rock! Side Story: Hiroi Kikuri's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ru: Одинокий Рокер! Спин-офф: Дневник пьяницы Хирои Кикури

altTitles.vi: Bocchi the Rock! Ngoại Truyện: Nhật Ký Say Rượu của Hiroi Kikuri
Bocchi the Rock! Ngoại truyện: Nhật ký say tít mù của Hiroi Kikuri

altTitles.ja-ro: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden: Hiroi Kikuri no Fukazake Nikki

description.en: Kikuri Hiroi (25 years old). She is a "genius bassist" who leads the indie band "SICK HACK", and she loves alcohol. She often gets drunk and breaks the equipment of the live house, so she seems to be short of money. She lives in a 52-year-old apartment without a bath, and sometimes borrows showers from her friends and acquaintances. She is regularly attacked by anxiety about her future, which she counters with a "happiness spiral" with the help of alcohol. What is her daily life like...?!

title.en: Maydare Tensei Monogatari: Kono Sekai de Ichiban Warui Majo

altTitles.ja: メイデーア転生物語
メイデーア転生物語 この世界で一番悪い魔女

altTitles.en: Tales of Reincarnation in Maydare: The World's Worst Witch

altTitles.de: Wiedergeburt in Maydare: Die bösartigste Hexe der Welt

altTitles.fr: Les contes de la réincarnation en le Maydaré
Les contes de la réincarnation en le Maydaré: La pire sorcière en le monde

description.de: Einst rettete Makia, die Tochter einer berüchtigten Hexe, dem Sklavenjungen Thor das Leben. Gemeinsam wuchsen sie auf und erlernten magische Fähigkeiten. Doch dann reißt das Schicksal sie auseinander und Makia landet an einer Magierakademie, wo sie sich schwört, die beste Schülerin ihres Jahrgangs zu werden, um ihren alten Freund möglichst schnell wiederzufinden. Denn es gibt noch ein weiteres Geheimnis, das sie verbindet: Beide kamen ursprünglich aus einer anderen Welt nach Maydare! Dort war Makia eine gewöhnliche, japanische Oberschülerin, die gemeinsam mit zwei anderen Klassenkameraden umgebracht wurde. Wird es ihr gelingen, das Verbrechen aufzuklären und in der neuen Welt ihr Glück zu finden?
description.en:
Makia is a noble lady descended from an infamous witch. Thor, a boy who was raised with her and came from another world, is chosen to be the knight of the "savior." The two are forced apart, and to see Thor once again, Makia aims to be the top student at Magic School!  


---
description.fr: Makia est une noble dame issue d'une infâme sorcière. Thor, un garçon qui a été élevé avec elle et est venu d'un autre monde, est choisi pour être le chevalier du «sauveur». Les deux sont forcés de se séparer, et pour revoir Thor, Makia vise à être la meilleure élève de Magic School!
description.id: Makia adalah seorang gadis bangsawan yang merupakan keturunan dari seorang penyihir yang dikenal akan kejahatannya. Thor, seorang anak laki-laki yang dirawat bersama makia dan datang dari dunia lain, dipilih untuk menjadi seorang ksatria bagi sang "penyelamat". Keduanya terpaksa harus berpisah karena suatu alasan, dan ketika mereka berdua dipertemukan kembali, Makia bertekad untuk menjadi murid terbaik yang ada di sekolah sihir! ---
description.ru: Загадочный мир под названием «Мейдер». В нём существуют магия, рыцари, драконы и… ведьмы. Макия – юная волшебница из дворянской семьи, являющаяся потомком «Самой худшей ведьмы этого мира», и любительница провести вечерок-другой, изучая новые заклинания. Однажды она встречает необычного паренька, которому даёт имя Тор. Вместе они продолжают углубляться в исследование колдовства и довольно быстро находят общий язык. Это начало длинной истории о девочке, пытающейся понять себя и свои истинные чувства.
description.tr: Makia, kötü şöhretli bir cadının soyundan gelen asil bir hanımefendi. Başka bir dünyadan gelen ve Makia ile birlikte büyüyen Thor, "Kurtarıcı"nın şövalyesi olarak seçiliyor. İkisi de birbirlerinden ayrılmak zorunda kalıyorlar ve Makia, Thor'u bir kez daha görmek için Büyü Okulu'nun en iyi öğrencisi olmayı hedefliyor!

altTitles.ja: サカモトホリデイズ

title.en: Blue Archive - Sensei Gyakutai Yume Senpai Imouto Gainen Series (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 先生虐待ユメ先輩妹概念シリーズ

altTitles.ja-ro: Sensei Gyakutai Yume Senpai Imouto Gainen Series (Blue Archive)

altTitles.en: The Sensei And Little Sister Yume's Abuse Concept Series (Blue Archive)

description.en:
Federal Informant ‘Baek Yisu’ and a criminal gang’s boss, ‘Baek Dogyeong’ are twin brothers.

With the same faces the two twin brothers have lived different lives until now. Yisu, who’s been betrayed by the gang, throws away his identity to become his brother. This federal agent is soon to become the gang’s boss…!
description.pt-br: Os irmãos gêmeos Baek Yisoo, agente de inteligência da Hid e Baek Dohyeong, chefe de uma organização criminosa, viveram vidas diferentes mesmo com o mesmo rosto. Depois de ser traído pela organização o irmão mais novo decide abandonar sua identidade e se tornar o irmão mais velho. Um agente de inteligência torna-se chefe de uma organização criminosa…!

description.en:
Park Hyung-Seok is an unattractive loner who wakes up in a different body. Now tall, handsome, and cooler than ever in his new form, Hyung-Seok aims to achieve everything he couldn't before.

How far will he go to keep his body... and his secrets?
description.pt: Em uma sociedade onde aparência significa tudo, Park Hyumg Suk, pequeno, gordo e não atraente, sofre bullying diariamente, mas nunca falou a sua mãe super trabalhadeira sobre isso. Um dia, quando sua mãe o vê sofrendo bullying, ela o envia para uma escola melhor. Mas infelizmente, ele descobre que sua nova escola é tão cruel quanto a anterior. Uma noite, ele acorda e descobre que de repente ficou alto, forte e incrivelmente bonito. Quando volta para a cama e encontra o seu corpo antigo corpo dormindo. Ele agora tem uma mente e dois corpos. Toda vez que um dorme, o outro corpo acorda, e toda vez que um acorda o outro dorme. Com medo de sofrer bullying novamente na nova escola, ele decide usar o seu novo corpo para ir à escola. Mas como será isso? Será que ele finalmente será aceito?
description.pt-br: Em uma sociedade onde aparência significa tudo, Park Hyumg Suk, pequeno, gordo e não atraente, sofre bullying diariamente, mas nunca falou a sua mãe super trabalhadeira sobre isso. Um dia, quando sua mãe o vê sofrendo bullying, ela o envia para uma escola melhor. Mas infelizmente, ele descobre que sua nova escola é tão cruel quanto a anterior. Uma noite, ele acorda e descobre que de repente ficou alto, forte e incrivelmente bonito. Quando volta para a cama e encontra o seu corpo antigo corpo dormindo. Ele agora tem uma mente e dois corpos. Toda vez que um dorme, o outro corpo acorda, e toda vez que um acorda o outro dorme. Com medo de sofrer bullying novamente na nova escola, ele decide usar o seu novo corpo para ir à escola. Mas como será isso? Será que ele finalmente será aceito?

title.en: Kiraware Majo to Karada ga Irekawatta Keredo, Watashi wa Kyou mo Genki ni Kurashiteimasu!

altTitles.ja: 嫌われ魔女と体が入れ替わったけれど、私は今日も元気に暮らしています！

altTitles.en: I Swapped Bodies With a Wicked Witch, but Today I'll Keep Having Fun!

description.en: A happy slow life begins with a switch! Marietta, princess of the snow country of Snewe, is trapped in a magic tower because she can't use magic. 8 years later, on her wedding day with the prince of the silver country, she thought she had succeeded in summoning a holy beast, but then... What appeared was...?
description.ja: 取り決めにより雪の国・スニューウから大国・ジルヴァラに輿入れしてきた王女・マリエッタ。しかし魔法が使えないマリエッタは塔に幽閉され、7年後に行われる聖獣召喚の儀式を成功させるため、ひたすら魔法の修行を強いられた。そして7年後見事に白い竜を召喚したマリエッタだが、次の瞬間謎の声にいざなわれ、気がつけば見知らぬ場所にいた。しかも見た目はそっくりなのに、どんな魔法も使えるほど魔力に溢れた身体になっていて…。

description.en:
South Korea is filled with various shitty laws.
The group of ‘juvenile kids’ that made my life into a living hell didn’t receive any punishment: these kids were the result of these shitty laws. I’ll now start my revenge.
description.kk:
Оңтүстік Корея әртүрлі заңдарға толы.
Менің өмірімді тозаққа айналдырған "жас балалар" тобы ешқандай жазаға тартылмады: бұл балалар осы заңдардың нәтижесі болды. Енді мен кек алуды бастаймын.
description.ko:
대한민국은 X같은 법들로 가득하다
나를 지옥으로 밀어넣고도 처벌받지 않았던 ‘촉법소년’들
그 X같은 법의 결과물들에게, 지금부터 복수를 시작한다
description.es-la: Corea del Sur está llena de leyes de mierda. El grupo de «menores» que convirtió mi vida en un infierno no recibió ningún castigo: esos menores fueron el resultado de esas leyes de mierda. Ahora comenzaré mi venganza. (Ocurre en el mismo universo de Lookism)
description.pt-br:
A Coreia do Sul está cheia de leis de merda.
E os ‘deliquentes’ que me empurraram para o inferno nunca foram punidos.
Então, está na hora de me vingar e passar por cima dessas leis de merda.

description.en:
Dead Mansion, a Russian private orphanage, trains children to become agents.

The legend of Dead Mansion, codename Sean, which was thought to have been lost due to a "shipping error", has appeared in Korea...?
description.ko:
어린아이들을 요원으로 양성하는 러시아 사설 보육원 '데드멘션'.

그리고 오배송으로 잃어버린 줄 알았던 데드멘션의 전설 '코드네임.

title.en: Whisper Me a Love Song Official Comic Anthology

altTitles.ja: ささやくように恋を唄う　公式コミックアンソロジー

altTitles.en: Whisper Me a Love Song Official Comic Anthology

description.en: The first official "Sasayaku You ni Koi o Utau'" comic anthology is here! Talented authors with unique styles tell stories that begin with a crush at first sight. [Participating Authors] COVER: Aono Nachi. ILLUSTRATIONS: Yosuke Kaneda, Miman. COMICS: Aotsubaki Toto, Aono Shimo, Ito Hachi, Inui, Utatane Yuu, Sikusiku, Torii Shizuku, Nekotarou, Haruhana Aya, Mukunoki Nanatsu, Yuama, Yukiko.
description.es-la: ¡Llega la primera antología oficial de cómics de "Sasayaku You ni Koi o Utau'"! Talentosísimos autores con estilos únicos narran historias que comienzan con un flechazo a primera vista. [Autores participantes] PORTADA: Aono Nachi. ILUSTRACIONES: Yosuke Kaneda, Miman. CÓMICS: Aotsubaki Toto, Aono Shimo, Ito Hachi, Inui, Utatane Yuu, Sikusiku, Torii Shizuku, Nekotarou, Haruhana Aya, Mukunoki Nanatsu, Yuama, Yukiko.

description.en:
Park Han-jun, once called a legend, was frustrated because he had nothing to lose anymore is given a huge amount of money.

An eye for an eye. An eye for a tooth! I’ll make you pay for what I’ve gone through!

As his rage explodes, he’ll get his sweet revenge and make them pay as much as they deserve!

altTitles.ja: 元ガチ勢、初心者に生まれ変わる

altTitles.zh: 全裸菜鸟在异世界被摩擦

description.en:
After learning 15 miserable years of his life as a failed gamer was one long nightmare, Lee Eojin is glad to be a newbie again! Vowing not to repeat the same mistakes, Eojin starts anew as the hotshot, Stagnant Water. 

He’s conquering monsters, getting sweet gear, and making enough dough to set himself up for life!

 Loved by fans and hated by foes, both old and new, will Eojin break the game and triumph, or will the game break him once again?
description.ja:
人気絶頂を誇ったゲームでもその寿命は限られている。実に15年もの歳月を一つのゲームにぶち込んだガチ勢・「淀水アムロ」は、ゲーム内で人生を賭けた一世一代の大博打に挑戦するがあえなく失敗。全てを失い気を失ったアムロが目覚めた所は、リリース初期の15年前だった。回帰前と同じ轍は踏まないと誓うアムロ。全てを知り尽くしたソシャゲ廃人は、最強のニュービーとして蘇る！

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=01Gu-5Hahfw)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8B%B3%EA%B3%A0%EB%8B%B3%EC%9D%80-%EB%89%B4%EB%B9%84/2446)
---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc29630)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/62754)
description.ko:
서비스 종료까지 앞으로 15년.
오직 나만이 엔딩을 알고 있다.

'나는 고인물이다'

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=01Gu-5Hahfw)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8B%B3%EA%B3%A0%EB%8B%B3%EC%9D%80-%EB%89%B4%EB%B9%84/2446)
---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc29630)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/62754)
description.ru:
До конца игры 15 лет. И только мне известно, как всё произойдет. – Я мертвая вода!

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=01Gu-5Hahfw)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8B%B3%EA%B3%A0%EB%8B%B3%EC%9D%80-%EB%89%B4%EB%B9%84/2446)
---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc29630)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/62754)
description.zh:
沉浸在虚拟游戏中的35岁宅男李煜阳不仅众叛亲离、借贷负债，还在游戏中赌输了唯一能还债的机会，在他绝望之际竟然阴差阳错穿越回了15年前，此时游戏还只是测试版，一切才刚刚开始，借此机会李煜阳想要改变人生，咸鱼翻身，踏上致富之路……凭借着十几年的经验与记忆，他脱下盔甲和内裤，决心站在游戏之巅，单纯地享受这一切！然而这一次，他会走向怎样的未来呢？

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=01Gu-5Hahfw)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8B%B3%EA%B3%A0%EB%8B%B3%EC%9D%80-%EB%89%B4%EB%B9%84/2446)
---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc29630)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/62754)

altTitles.th: เหรียญทองแดงปราบพิภพ

description.en: The monk, Xuan Min, having lost all his memories yet retaining some skill in fengshui, geomancy and other arts,  on the first day in Ningyang, unceremoniously raided a cursed mansion, and incidentally also dragged out the true dragon, Xue Xian, hiding within. Here begins the story of the half-paralysed dragon, Xue Xian, and the cold and haughty monk, Xuan Min, joining efforts to search out the dragon bones and lost memories.
description.es-la:
En su primer día en NingYang, el monje XuanMin, que había perdido por completo su
memoria, pero que tenía algunos conocimientos sobre el agua y la geomancia, asaltó sin pensarlo una maligna mansión y, de paso, al verdadero dragón Xue Xian, que se encontraba en su interior. A partir de ahí, la historia de Xue Xian, un dragón medio
paralizado, y XuanMin, un monje de gran espíritu, comienza con la búsqueda de sus huesos y sus recuerdos.

description.en: JaeJu (which means “skill” in Korean) grew up without parents in an orphanage skillfully, just like his name suggests. One day, he heard that the orphanage was having a hard time and would have to close in 3 years. While trying to raise money for the orphanage, JaeJu got an alert on his phone. On it, he saw a video of himself climbing the tower as a BJ (broadcasting jockey aka streamer). Seven years ago, a tower suddenly appeared and randomly took people into it. If you successfully complete the tower and become an “Awakened”, it’s only a matter of time before you get rich!
description.ko:
부모님 없이 보육원에서 자란 재주
이름처럼 재주있게 살아가던 어느날
보육원이 어려워 3년 뒤 문을 닫게 된다는 이야기를 듣게 된다.

보육원을 위해 돈을 구해보려던 재주의 핸드폰에
갑작스럽게 알림이 울리고
핸드폰에서는 탑을 오르며 BJ가 되어있는 
자신의 영상이 재생된다.

7년 전, 갑작스럽게 세상에 나타나
무작위로 사람을 데려가는 탑.

이 탑에서 무사히 돌와 '각성자' 가 된다면
큰 돈을 버는 것은 시간 문제!

핸드폰에 영상을 보낸 것은 누구이며
재주는 무사히 탑을 오를 수 있을 것인가?!
description.pt-br: Jaeju (significa “habilidade” em coreano) cresceu sem pais em um orfanato com muita habilidade, assim como o nome sugere. Um dia, ele soube que o orfanato estava passando por dificuldades e iria fechar em 3 anos. Enquanto tentava juntar dinheiro para o orfanato, JaeJu recebeu um alerta em seu celular. Nele JaeJu viu um vídeo de si mesmo escalando a torre como um streamer. Sete anos atrás, a torre apareceu de repente e aleatoriamente levou pessoas para lá. Se completar a torre com sucesso e se tornar um “Despertado”, é só questão de tempo até que fique rico!

description.en: At the young age of twenty, Seol Mudok, a master swordsman, became the Lord of the Northern Sea Ice Palace. Plunged into despair after the death of his lover, he discovers that with the legendary flower, the “Lotus of Love,” that his deceased lover has been reincarnated. In his quest, he descends into another world…
description.fr: À l’âge de vingt ans, Seol Mudok, un maître de l’épée, est devenu le seigneur du Palais des glaces de la mer du Nord. Plongé dans le désespoir après la mort de son amante, il découvre qu’avec la fleur légendaire, le « Lotus de l’Amour », sa défunte amante s’est réincarné. Dans sa quête, il descend dans un autre monde…

altTitles.ja: 青騎士バニー
Der Blaue Reiter - Die Häschenmädchen
ヘルク

description.en:
The Demon King has been defeated, and now the Demon World is running a contest to choose his successor.   
A muscular and high-level human named Helck has joined and says that he wants to destroy all HUMANS. Is he serious?  
Red Vamirio, one of the Four Heavenly Kings of the whole Demon Empire, is monitoring the contest and can't believe this. What's the secret behind Helck and the human world?
description.pt: Helck é o herói que derrotou um dos reis demônio. Quando um rei demônio morre, um novo deve ser declarado. Isso é feito através de um torneio de artes marciais, onde o mais forte se torna o novo governante. Vamiro, um dos Grandes Reis Demônios, descobre que Helck é um dos participantes do torneio e tem ganhado todas as lutas! Qual poderia ser o motivo? Se um humano se torna o próximo rei demônio, o que isso significa para o reino demoníaco?

title.en: I Became a Childhood Friend of a Mid-Level Boss

altTitles.en: I Became the Childhood Friend of the Middle Boss

description.en:
Do Kyunwoo is the black sheep of his renowned swordsman family. He cannot even catch a rabbit on his own. On his first day of fifth grade, he meets a tranfer student and recalls his past life.

He had reincarnated into the world of a game he used to play called [Brave Hearts]. He was already frustrated that he had reincarnated as a loser, but on top of that, the transfer student is an intermediate/mid-tier boss who will destroy the world!

“Why are you being so nice to me?”

“Because I want to be friends with you.”

Do Kyunwoo’s plan is to become friends with the transfer student in order to prevent the end of the world!

In order to survive in this new world and to reach an ending he desires. He becomes best friends with the mid level boss.

"I’m... back!"

After a comet collides on Earth, a gaming world filled with monsters and dungeons becomes a reality. Amidst the chaos, Gong Won-Ho wakes up as Hardcore Leveling Warrior, an almighty game character with exceptional luck and power.

Once again, he will embark on a journey to become the strongest... but this time, on Earth!

Stinky tofu, durian, surstromming’s era is over. have you heard? cooking that’s so bad that you could die on the spot! but skill is increasing!?

Tera, whose cooking boasts the best(?) taste in all dimensions, through the bravest yoo seungwoo’s help, has come to peaceful(?) earth.

Endure it! if you eat it and don’t die, your level will go up! and then on behalf of me, protect the earth!

‘Extraordinary restaurant’ is open even when the world is going to end.
description.ko:
취두부, 두리안, 수르스트뢰밍의 시대는 갔다.
들어는 봤는가? 문자 그대로 죽을 만큼 맛없는 요리!
하지만 능력이 오른다!?

전 차원 최고(?)의 맛을 자랑하는 테라의 요리가
최강의 용사, 유승우의 손에 의해 평화로운(?) 지구를 찾아온다.

인내하라! 먹고 죽지만 않으면 허약한 당신도 레벨이 쑥쑥!
그리고 나 대신 지구를 지켜라!


'괴식식당'은 세상이 멸망해도 영업합니다!

altTitles.vi: Ta Sáng Tạo Truyền Thuyết Đô Thị
Ta Ở Tokyo Sáng Tạo Truyền Thuyết Đô Thị
Ta, Sáng Tạo Ra Đô Thị Truyền Thuyết

description.en: The protagonist Yuan Zhenji crossed to the parallel world of Jiangshi, and found that this world was full of various horror and weirdness, and ordinary humans were as fragile as paper in front of them. He used a notebook called "Urban Legend Records" to create urban legends that affect reality, punish criminals and contain weirdness, absorb the weird rule ability "use magic to defeat magic", and become a monitor who fights against weirdness, and fights with his partners against the coming doomsday-level weirdness...
description.vi:
Sau khi xuyên không tới đất nước Nhật Bản trong thế giới song song, Kanbaru Shinji có được một quyển sổ ghi chép tên là Truyền Thuyết Đô Thị Thực Lục.
Mọi truyền thuyết đô thị cậu ghi vào đó đều có thể trở thành sự thật.
Mà Nhật Bản ở thế giới này còn thiếu khuyết rất nhiều truyền thuyết đô thị từng xuất hiện trong kiếp trước như là Hanako nhà vệ sinh, Thiếu Nữ Đến Từ Địa Ngục, Quý bà Hachishaku, Cuộc gọi của Mary, Con Mắt Trong Khe Hở...
Kanbaru Shinji: “Để ta khiến cho Nhật Bản này quần ma loạn vũ đi!”
Tóm tắt theo tiểu thuyết gốc, bản manhua đã chỉnh sửa rất nhiều từ tên nhân vật cho đến bối cảnh, vui lòng theo dõi truyện để biết thêm chi tiết.

description.en: On the Jiuzhou continent, humans, demons, various races coexist. The human race is led by the Daqing Immortal Dynasty, where mortals and cultivators live together. However, cultivation requires a one-in-ten-thousand talent. When mortals cause trouble, there is the patrol camp to deal with them. When nobles cause trouble, there is the Jinyiwei. But when cultivators and demons cause trouble with their sorcery, only the Sword-Wielding Person can bring peace. The Sword-Wielding Person is no different from an ordinary person; with a single Sword, they can easily slay cultivators.

title.en: The Dungeon Cleaning Life of a Once Genius Hunter

altTitles.en: The Sagacious Cleaning Life of a Returned Genius Hunter

altTitles.ru: Мудрая уборка жизни вернувшегося охотника за гениями

altTitles.en: Clever Cleaning Life Of The Returned Genius Hunter

description.en:
World’s first SSS-ranked genius hunter, Kim Jun-woo.

He regresses ten years into the past after being ambushed by unknowns one day. With all his hunter skills now locked, he must fulfill his career as a dungeon cleaner to unlock them.

But this cleaner… is extraordinary!

The once renowned hunter, Kim Jun-woo, takes over the cleaning duty with vigorous determination.
description.fr:
Kim Jun-Woo, le premier chasseur de génie de rang SSS au monde.

Il est un utilisateur incroyable de capacité, mais sa personnalité horrible conduit à des problèmes avec sa réputation.

Au milieu de ses problèmes, il a été attaqué et tué par un groupe non identifié.

Quand il a ouvert les yeux, il était retourné dans le passé, il y a 10 ans.

Bien qu’il essaie de redevenir un chasseur et d’élever son rang, ses compétences ont toutes été scellées par le karma de sa vie antérieure.

Pour le libérer, il doit travailler comme « nettoyeur de donjon », un métier réputé pour être extrêmement dur dans cette industrie !

Mais ce nettoyeur, il est différent !
description.ko:
세계 최초 SSS랭크 천재 헌터 김준우.
대단한 능력자지만, 인정머리가 없는 탓에 평판에 문제가 생긴다.
골머리를 썩히고 있는 와중, 정체를 알 수 없는 집단에게 습격받아 죽게 되고,
눈을 떠보니 10년 전 시점으로 회귀한 상태.

다시 헌터가 되어 랭크를 올리려 했지만, 이전 생의 업보로 인해 스킬을 모두 봉인 당하고,
해제를 위해서는 업계에선 극한 직업으로 유명한 '던전 청소부'로 일을 해야 하는데?!

하지만 이 청소부, 남다르다!
몬스터는 물론이거니와, 골깝떠는 헌터, 자리만 차지하는 낙하산 상사, 심지어 동료가 될 사람까지
모든 걸 청소할 기세로 깽판을 치는데...

현직 헌터보다 더 강한 전직 헌터의 망나니식 청소가 시작된다!
description.pt-br:
Kim Jun-woo, o primeiro caçador genial de rank SSS.

Ele é um incrível usuário de habilidades, mas sua personalidade horrível trás problemas para sua reputação.

No meio de seus problemas, ele foi atacado e morto por um grupo não identificado. E quando abriu os olhos, havia retornado 10 anos para seu passado.

Embora ele tente voltar a ser um caçador e aumentar seu rank, as habilidades dele foram seladas pelo karma de sua vida passada.

Para conseguir libertar suas habilidades, ele precisa trabalhar como um “Limpador de Dungeons”, que tem a fama de ser incrivelmente difícil! Mas esse faxineiro, ele é diferente!

Não apenas monstros – caçadores problemáticos, superiores conseguindo suas posições por puro nepotismo, e até mesmo seus colegas.

Ele está fazendo a maior bagunça para limpar tudo. O ex-caçador, que é mais forte do que os caçadores atuais, e sua limpeza maluca vão começar!

altTitles.ja: 二度生きるランカー

altTitles.en: Ranker Who Lives A Second Time

altTitles.th: เกมชีวิตที่สอง ของแรงเกอร์

description.en:
Yeonwoo’s brother disappeared years ago, and he’s devastated to learn of his death.

As he copes with his loss, he’s given a pocket watch and learns there’s more to his brother’s death: he was betrayed while competing in the Tower of the Sun God.

Now it’s Yeonwoo’s turn to use the knowledge his brother left behind.

Can Yeonwoo navigate that world and gain enough power and experience to reach the top of the tower, defeating his brother’s enemies and all those who stand in his way?

---

**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%91%90-%EB%B2%88-%EC%82%AC%EB%8A%94-%EB%9E%AD%EC%BB%A4/2335)
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation (Kakao)](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E7%95%B0%E7%95%8C%E6%94%BB%E5%A1%94%E6%88%B0%E8%A8%98/36)
- [Official Indonesian Translation (Kakao)](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Ranker-yang-Hidup-Dua-Kali/3392)
- [Official Japanese Translation (Piccoma)](https://piccoma.com/web/product/30298)
- [Official Thai Translation (Kakao)](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87_%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C/37)
description.fr:
Yeon-woo avait un frère jumeau qui a disparu il y a cinq ans. Un jour, une montre de poche laissée par son frère est retournée en sa possession. À l'intérieur, il a trouvé un journal intime caché dans lequel on pouvait lire : "Le temps que tu entendes ceci, je serai déjà mort…".  
l'Obélisque, la Tour du Dieu Soleil, un monde où plusieurs univers et dimensions se croisent. Dans ce monde, son frère avait été victime d'une trahison en montant la tour. Après avoir appris la vérité, Yeon-woo décida d'escalader la tour avec le journal de son frère.  
Yeon-woo passe ensuite par les mêmes épreuves que son frère cadet et combat en tant que joueur anonyme. Son but ? Vaincre la Tour de l'Obélisque et venger son frère.
description.id: Setelah 5 tahun hilang, Cha Yeonwoo menemukan fakta bahwa adiknya, Cha Jungwoo, sudah meninggal. Ketika membongkar barang peninggalan adiknya, dia menemukan sebuah jam saku. Jam saku itu adalah hadiahnya untuk Jungwoo supaya lulus ujian. Begitu membuka jam tersebut, Cha Yeonwoo mendengar suara adiknya yang menceritakan kehidupannya selama 5 tahun ini. Ternyata Cha Jungwoo bukan hilang melainkan terdampar di dunia lain. Di dunia itu pula Cha Jungwoo dikhianati dan dibunuh. Mendengar itu, amarah Cha Yeonwoo bangkit. Dia berniat balas dendam atas kematian adiknya. Berbekal pengetahuan yang dia dapat dari Jungwoo, Cha Yeonwoo pun pergi ke dunia lain tersebut. Berhasilkah Cha Yeonwoo balas dendam?!
description.it:
Yeon-woo aveva un fratello gemello scomparso cinque anni fa…  
Un giorno, un orologio da tasca lasciato da suo fratello è tornato in suo possesso. Dentro, ha trovato un diario nascosto nel quale è stato registrato “Quando ascolterai questo, immagino che sarò già morto …”
description.ja: ある日豪の元に届いた双子の弟・駿の訃報。 虚無感を感じる彼の元に駿の懐中時計が届く。 そして豪はその中に隠された駿の日記によって、 駿が道半ばで力尽きた太陽神の塔・オベリスクへと誘われていく―。 弟の復讐に燃える豪が挑む、痛快アクションファンタジー！
description.ko:
5년 전 사라진 쌍둥이 동생을 잊고 살던 연우.
어느날 그에게 동생의 유품인 회중시계가 돌아왔다.

그리고 그 속에 숨겨진 일기장.

'형이 이 일기를 들을 때 즈음이라면 나는 이미 이 세상 사람이 아니겠지.'

여러 차원과 우주가 교차하는 세계에 놓인 태양의 신 탑, 오벨리스크.
그리고 그곳에 오르다 배신당해 눈을 감아야 했던 동생.

모든 걸 알게 된 연우는 동생이 남겨 둔 일기와 함께 탑을 오르기 시작한다.

'오늘부터 난. 차정우이다.'
description.ru:
Ёну в течение 5 лет жил, смирившись с исчезновением своего младшего брата-близнеца. Однажды ему в руки попали карманные часы его брата.​ Внутри них он обнаружил спрятанную записку.​ «Брат, если ты сейчас слушаешь эти записи, то меня уже нет на Земле». Узнав о том, что его младший брат отправился в Обелиск — башню богов, которая находится где-то в космосе на пересечении нескольких измерений, и был предан, Ёну решает отправиться туда сам.
«С этого момента я буду Ча Чонъу.​»
description.th: ชายอนอู ชายหนุ่มที่น้องชายหายตัวไป พร้อมกับต้องเสียแม่ไปเพราะโรคร้ายได้ ได้ตัดสินใจไปเป็นทหารอาสาสมัครที่ประเทศแอฟริกา จนอยู่มาวันนึงเขาได้ค้นพบความจริงว่า น้องชายของเขาได้หายตัวไปขณะกำลังตามหา 'ยาอายุวัฒนะ' ของอีกโลกหนึ่ง เพื่อนำมารักษาแม่ พร้อมกับถ่ายโอนพลังทิ้งไว้แก่เขา
description.tr: Yeon-woo’nun kardeşi beş yıl önce ortadan kaybolmuştur. Bir gün kardeşinden kalan bir cep saati eline geçer. İçinde, kardeşinin bırakmış olduğu gizli bir günlüğün olduğunu fark eder. ”Sen bunu bulduğunda, ben çoktan bu dünyadan göçmüş olacağım.” Obelisk, güneş tanrısının kulesi, farklı evrenler ve boyutların iç içe geçtiği bir dünyadır. Kardeşi, bu dünyada kuleye tırmanmaya çalışırken ihanete uğrayıp hayatını kaybetmiştir. Gerçeği öğrenmiş olan Yeon-woo, kardeşinin günlüğü ile birlikte kuleye tırmanmaya karar verir. ”Şu andan itibaren ben, Cha Jeong-woo’yum.”
description.zh-hk:
延宇選擇遺忘5年前消失的雙胞胎弟弟，
過上屬於自己的生活，
卻在某天收到了弟弟的遺物——懷錶。

而在那懷錶之中，還隱藏著弟弟的日誌。

「當哥聽見我的日誌時，
也代表我已經不在這個世界上了吧。」

方尖碑——各個次元與宇宙交會的太陽神之塔。

弟弟就是在攻塔過程中遭受背叛，不幸喪命。

於是，得知一切真相的延宇帶著弟弟留下的日誌，
踏上了攻塔之路!

altTitles.ja: 地雷なんですか？地原さん

altTitles.en: That Girl Is Cute… But Dangerous?

altTitles.pt-br: Aquela Garota é Bonita, Mas Perigosa?

description.en: The girl sitting next to me at the start of the new semester is the rumored "landmine" girl… but… is Chihara-san really the "landmine" that everyone says she is?
description.pt-br: A garota sentada ao meu lado no começo do novo semestre é a famosa Garota Perigosa, mas… a Chihara-san é mesmo o “Perigo” que todos dizem ser?

title.en: Reborn as a Monster 2: Rise of the Beast God

altTitles.en: Reborn as a Monster 2: Rise of the Beast God

altTitles.zh: Chongsheng Wei Guaishou Shenme Gui 2: Shou Shen Jueqi
重生为怪兽什么鬼2：兽神崛起

description.en: A thousand years ago, under the blood moon, spatial rifts opened, heralding the era of monsters! Countless monsters rampaged across the globe! Just as humanity was on the brink of complete extinction, the emergence of “Beast Spirit Masters” brought a glimmer of hope to all of humanity! With generations of inheritance and the development of “Beast Spirit Masters”, humanity successfully created a new civilizational order to combat the monster invasion! Lin Yuan, who was a top assassin in his previous life but was tragically betrayed and killed by his organization, transmigrates…

This is a world where awakened people and alienated beasts coexist. Zhang Ping was lucky to become an awakened person, but his ability was rated as useless. He was unwilling to live a mediocre life, so he resolutely swallowed the contract gem that ordinary people avoided like snakes and scorpions, contracted himself, and became his own summoned beast! From then on, the whole world opened up to him. Ever-changing superpowers, endless alienated beasts, and dangerous parallel worlds, everything is possible.

title.en: Shy na Ano Ko ni Natsukaretai

altTitles.ja: シャイなあの子に懐かれたい

altTitles.en: I Want To Be Liked By That Shy Girl

description.en:
Three years ago, a doomsday prepper named Park Kyu, who predicted the world’s end and prepared for it in every way possible. As he expected, one day, a nuclear attack on Seoul led to a global nuclear war, resulting in an unprecedented apocalypse.

Despite everyone’s ridicule, the protagonist Park Kyu spent his entire fortune over the past three years to quietly dig out his own bunker. Was it merely a coincidence that he foresaw all these events?
description.pt-br: Park Gyu é um sobrevivente que previu e se preparou para o apocalipse vindouro. Neste mundo em ruínas, ele está disposto a fazer tudo e qualquer coisa que puder para proteger o conforto de seu abrigo antibombas.

title.en: Evolution Begins With a Big Tree

altTitles.zh-ro: Cóng Dà Shù Kāishǐ De Jìnhuà

altTitles.ja: 進化する者たち

altTitles.vi: Chuyển Sinh Thành Liễu Đột Biến

altTitles.ru: Моё перерождение в древо: Начало эволюции

description.en:
Reborn as a willow tree!? Resurrection of spiritual energy, rise of all things. The reborn willow has also embarked on the path of evolution. It can evolve infinitely, is it “divine power” or “curse”?

Official Translations:
[Japanese](https://piccoma.com/web/product/146958)
description.ru:
После смерти Юй Цзыюй перерождается и становится… Ивой! 
И неизвестно, сумеет ли он приспособиться к такой знакомой, но в то же время чуждой окружающей среде – ведь так совпало, что его перерождение случилось как раз во время Великой эпохи возрождения духовной энергии. 
Возрождение духовной энергии знаменует возвышение всех существ… 
Рев хищных зверей стал способен сотрясти горы и взволновать реки, а существа с могущественной силой наводнили этот мир в таком количестве, что он вот-вот лопнет по швам. 
Но, несмотря на все это, во время подобной эпохи выросла величественная ива, способная безгранично развиваться и эволюционировать. 
Плоды, что растут на ней, способны даровать другим необычайные способности, а духовная энергия, которую она распространяет, укрепляет силы зверей, что обитают на ее территории. 
… 
Одни величают ее мировым древом – Иггдрасилем, день за днем восславляя его существование! 
Другие – «великим божественным древом», подпирающим небосвод! 
Разумеется, большинство просто зовут его «священным древом», или «проклятым деревом», или же «дьявольским деревом»… Да и еще много как. 
И все же, при любом его упоминании в голосе каждого ясно слышится благоговейный трепет.
description.zh: 黑鸟社新作，重生成为一株柳树！？灵气复苏，万物崛起。重生的柳树也走上了进化之路。能够无限进化的它，是“神力”还是“诅咒”？

altTitles.ja: お狐ギャルの片喰さん

description.en:
A very ordinary and serious high school student, Kamou-kun.
Though his days are filled with diligent study, his concern lies in his childhood friend, Katabami-san, who interferes with his studies every day. And to make matters more complicated, Katabami-san's true identity is... a fox spirit!?

The struggle between Kamou-kun, who doesn't want to be bothered, and Katabami-san, who craves attention, begins anew today!

---

**Alternative Raw:** [Nico Nico Seiga](https://sp.seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/66393)

title.en: Counterattacking System Available At The Grand Ascension Stage

altTitles.zh: Dacheng Qi Cai You Ni Xi Xitong

altTitles.en: Only in the Mahayana Period Does the Counterattack System Exist

description.en: Jiang Li, after crossing over, discovered he possessed no cheat abilities so he had no choice but to diligently cultivate. Five hundred years later, he became the strongest in the Nine Provinces. Suddenly, a system appeared, claiming it could help the host go from the Qi Refining stage to becoming the number one in the Nine Provinces. Jiang Li stared at the first task, lost in thought. “Host, please defeat your cousin (at the sixth level of Qi Refining).” “Your system seems to have quite a delay, doesn’t it?”

altTitles.ja: 奴隷を調教してハーレム作る

altTitles.pt-br: Treinando escravas pra fazer um harem

altTitles.en: Training Slaves to Make a Harem

altTitles.es-la: Entrenando Esclavas Para Hacer Un Harem

description.en: A man purchases three little slaves and begins to groom them into perfect girls for his harem. You will never have a gaggle of lolis with horns in your life. ;_;
description.vi: Đây là câu chuyện về gã chủ nhân mua nô lệ, chăm sóc giáo dục các bé lên người để hiện thực hoá giấc mơ dàn harem lý tưởng
description.es-la: Un hombre compra 3 esclavas Lolis para así poder criarlas y convertirlas en mujeres de su agrado para que posteriormente cuando crezcan completamente de acuerdo a sus gustos pueda hacerles el sin respeto a gusto las veces que quiera
description.pt-br: Um homem compra três pequenas escravas e começa a transformá-las em garotas perfeitas para seu harém.

description.en:
In the era of astral pets, only the might of pets was essential! However, making the pets stronger has always been a slow and arduous process for pet warriors. That was until the appearance of a mysterious pet shop that changed everything!

The weakest skeleton could slay a great golden dragon with a single strike after training at this pet shop! Even the humble watchdog of the shop possessed ten legendary skills, and the female worker in the shop claimed to be a Goddess...

As for what the shopkeeper Su Ping thinks: I'm merely training these cute pets to become exceptional overlord beasts. What? Is it not normal?
- - -
In the era of beasts, pet strength determines everything! The battle pet master works hard and slowly to improve the strength of the pet. Until a mysterious pet store came out of nowhere!

In just a few days of cultivation, the lowly skeleton can kill the golden dragon with a single slash. Does the guard dog have ten secret skills of pet beats? The working girl even calls herself a god...

As for the owner, Su Ping: Isn't it a regular practice to breed cute pets into prehistoric king beasts?

title.en: Using My Cooking Skills in a Murim World

altTitles.en: A Bowl of Black Bean Noodles Would Be Served by the Son-in-Law of Zhuge Family

description.en:
With a dream to become the ultimate Chinese cuisine chef, our protagonist finds himself inexplicably transported to the Song Dynasty in China! However, upon awakening, he discovers that he possesses no martial arts skills whatsoever. All that remains are the culinary techniques he mastered in his previous life. Surprisingly, these dishes… receive an overwhelmingly positive response!

Can he, with a single bowl of Jjajangmyeon, truly conquer the martial world?
Will he be able to captivate the Central Plains with his Jjajangmyeon and lead a successful second life in this era?

title.en: Touhou Suichouka ~ Lotus Eater-tachi no Suisei

altTitles.en: The Lotus Eaters, Drunk and Sober
Touhou Drunken Butterfly Flower ~ Lotus Eaters' Sobering

altTitles.ja: 東方酔蝶華　ロータスイーター達の酔醒

altTitles.pt-br: Touhou: Flor de Borboleta Bêbada ~ Comedores de Lotus, Bêbados e Sóbrios
Flor de Borboleta Bêbada Oriental ~ Os Bêbados e Sóbrios Comedores de Lotus

description.en: In this sixth official Touhou manga series from ZUN, the shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei goes to investigate a strange rumor in the human village, where she gets involved with the local Geidontei bar and its poster girl, Miyoi Okunoda.
description.ja: 幻想郷の人里にある居酒屋「鯢呑亭（げいどんてい）」には、最近、飲んだ帰りの客が妖怪にさらわれて失踪するという噂が。博麗神社の巫女・霊夢はこの疑惑の調査に乗り出す。どうやらカギは看板娘の美宵のようで…？
description.es-la:
En la aldea humana de Gensokyo, un rumor sobre un youkai que supuestamente secuestra a personas alcoholizadas se extiende de forma repentina con gran rapidez, causando miedo y preocupación entre la gente. Mientras tanto, en el centro de este rumor, el bar izakaya Geidontei, no hay nada fuera de lugar en lo que respecta a su comida y bebida, o incluso con respecto a su propietario.

Cuando la sacerdotisa Reimu Hakurei se entera de la situación, intenta cumplir con su deber de investigar el sospechoso establecimiento. Sin embargo, el caso la lleva a otra persona: Miyoi Okunoda, cuya existencia parece ser tan volátil como una burbuja.
description.pt-br:
Uma estranha história sobre álcool. O mais novo mangá oficial de "Touhou", escrito por ZUN.   
  
Existe um rumor de que em um bar chamado "Geidontei", localizado em uma área remota de Gensokyo, um cliente bêbado foi sequestrado por um youkai. Reimu, sacerdotisa do Santuário Hakurei, embarca em uma investigação, mas aparentemente, a chave para desvendar o caso está na garçonete da loja…?

title.en: Rettougan no Tensei Majutsushi - Shiitagerareta Moto Yuusha wa Mirai no Sekai o Yoyuu de Ikinuku (GIGATOON Studio)

altTitles.ja: 劣等眼の転生魔術師 ~虐げられた元勇者は未来の世界を余裕で生き抜く~ (GIGATOON Studio)

altTitles.en: The Reincarnated Magician With Inferior Eyes ~The Oppressed Ex-hero Survives the Future World With Ease~

description.en: In a world where eye color determines one’s magical prowess, there existed a mage of unparalleled might, Abel. Feared even by allies, he transfers his soul to the distant future in search of an ideal realm. Yet, in this new era, his once-celebrated eyes are dubbed “Inferior Eyes” and he becomes the butt of ridicule. Harassed by high-borne nobles and unjustly discriminated against, Abel discovers that while magic has diminished in this technologically advanced future, his Amber Eyes conceal a power beyond human comprehension. This hero from the past is set to revolutionize the magic of the future!

title.en: The Demon King Dad and His Hero Daughter

description.en:
Selene, the daughter who dreams of becoming a hero, and Shion, the demon king who adopted her. Shion has to conceal his true identity at all costs, unable to cheer on his daughter’s dreams or attempt to stop her.
This is the story of Selene’s journey to becoming a true hero amidst this dilemma… Or is it the parenting story of the demon king?!

If mercy and kindness can’t save the world, then this time, I choose to kill—

Eternal Slayer! Heavenly Lightning Slash! Sword of Annihilation! As long as you learn the most common sword skills, they can be upgraded to SSS rank?! Divine talent + forbidden skills! I’m the last spark of hope in this apocalypse!

First among the ten martial emperors, Peerless Martial Emperor Gu Fei Yang met his demise in the Tiandang mountains. He was reincarnated fifteen years later, as Li Yun Xiao of the Tianshui Nation, and thus began a heaven-defying battlefront with the countless talents of the current generation. Martial arts of the nine heavens and ten divine realms. From then on, the whole world was set ablaze.
description.es-la: Gu Feiyan, el tercer soberano, muere y es reencarnado en un niño llamado Li Yunxia, una completa basura que todavía no despertó sus meridianos a pesar de su edad. ¡Pero esto no detendrá al MC de alcanzar el pináculo de este mundo otra vez!

description.en: Is he crazy? Or just the typical attention seeker? Lee Kwang-Jin, who doesn't understand the difference in people, and his Master Kwak No who's the one helping him to understand the differences of people. A warm human story of a student and his Master.
description.ko:
미친놈인가?
아니면 흔한 관심종자인가?

사람의 다름을 이해 못 하는 제자 이강진.
그리고 그걸 이해시켜주고자 하는 스승 곽노.
두 사제師弟의 따뜻한 휴먼스토리.

altTitles.ja: はらぺこ母娘と元カレ家主

altTitles.ja-ro: Hara peko Oyako to Motokare Yanushi

altTitles.en: A Hungry Mother and Daughter And Her Ex-Boyfriend Landlord

altTitles.pt-br: Uma mãe faminta, sua Filha e seu Ex-Namorado Proprietário

description.en: 36-year-old Takaharu lives alone. After graduating from Art College, he has been living a quiet life while painting pictures. One day, his ex-girlfriend Kyou, whom he broke up with 17 years ago, comes to him with her daughter Minori and asks him to let them stay at his place. As in their college days, Kyou is attracted by the delicious food, and so the three of them begin to live together.
description.ja: 36歳のたかはるは一人暮らし。美大を卒業後、ほそぼそと絵を描いて暮らしていた。そんなある日、17年前に別れた元カノ・キョウが娘のみのりを連れてやってきて「居候をさせて欲しい」という。大学時代同様においしい食べ物につられたキョウにほだされ、三人での生活が始まるが……？
description.pt-br: Takaharu, de 36 anos, mora sozinho. Depois de se formar na Art College, ele vive uma vida tranquila enquanto pinta quadros. Um dia, sua ex-namorada Kyou, com quem ele terminou há 17 anos, vem até ele com sua filha Minori e pede que ele as deixe ficar em sua casa. Assim como nos tempos de faculdade, Kyou se sente atraída pela comida deliciosa, e assim os três passam a morar juntos.

altTitles.ja: Ousamatachi no Viking
王様達のヴァイキング

description.en: 18-year-old Koreeda Kazuki is a genius hacker whose only real skill lies with computers. Into his aimless life steps a wealthy man who makes him a proposition he finds impossible to refuse: that he will become Koreeda's investor on the condition that Koreeda use his abilities to help the man "conquer the world." In cyberspace where national borders hold no meaning, thus begins the story of two modern-day adventurers who stand against crime on a global scale.

altTitles.ja: めぐる未来

description.en:
Mirai, a man who does not show his emotions, lives happily with his innocent and cheerful wife Meguru, but he has a "cursed disease" that he keeps secret even from his wife.
Then one day, Mirai receives an important call from the police concerning his wife...!
